name: Hentai Crush
description: As a single man who desperately wants to have a girlfriend, you have been introduced to a lot of girls via matchmaking service. Let's seduce them and advance your relationship...<h3>Game Features:</h3><br/><br/><ul><li> Lots of animated CG of beatiful girls<br/></li><li> Dating simulation elements combined with bubble shooter gameplay<br/></li><li> Interesting dialogs<br/></li><li> Lots of item to collect<br/></li><li> Relaxing and romantic music<br/></li><li> Cute and sexy native Japanese voice</li></ul><br/><br/><br/>
